Post.title: Raft-PartA
Post.content:
MIT6.824 Distribute System Lab2 raft part A,raftGithub

Implement leader election and heartbeats (AppendEntries RPCs with no log entries). The goal for Part 2A is for a single leader to be elected, for the leader to remain the leader if there are no failures, and for a new leader to take over if the old leader fails or if packets to/from the old leader are lost. Run go test -run 2A to test your 2A code.

Part A raftraftserverraftRPCAppendEntries RPC RequestVote RPCAppendEntres RPClogHeartBeatserver followerRequestVote RPCfollowercandidateserverFigure 2

  1. serverFLLOWER,CANDIDATEFOLLOWERHerat BeatRequestVote RPC
  2. CANDIDATESERVERRequest VoteCANDIDATELEADER;termAppendEntries RPCtermservertermFOLLOWER
  3. LEADERHeart BeatLEADERFOLLOWERFOLLOWERreplytermFOLLOWER

MIT6.824 Distribute System Lab2 raft part A,raftGithub

Implement leader election and heartbeats (AppendEntries RPCs with no log entries). The goal for Part 2A is for a single leader to be elected, for the leader to remain the leader if there are no failures, and for a new leader to take over if the old leader fails or if packets to/from the old leader are lost. Run go test -run 2A to test your 2A code.
